price: Por certo, Allah sabe todas as cousas que eles invocam em vez dEle. E Ele é O Todo-Poderoso, O Sábio.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا يَدۡعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَيۡءٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha yaʿlamu mā yadʿūna min dūnihi min shayin wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
